FUSIOCOAT® est le fruit de plus de 15 an: FUSIOCOAT® is the result of more than 15 years of scientific research in the chemistry of coatings.
Les produits FUSIOCOAT® apportent une du: FUSIOCOAT® products provide unprecedented durability against climatic and chemical effects to preserve the aesthetic qualities of surfaces, while being non-toxic for humans and the environment.
Combien de temps faut-il pour recouvrir: How long does it take to coat a car with Ceramic Coating?
Combien de temps dois-je attendre avant: How long do I have to wait when I Ceramic Coat a car?
Combien de temps dure le revêtement céra: How long does Ceramic Coating last?
La durée exacte dépend de plusieurs fact: The exact duration depends on several factors, such as the size of the car, the condition of the surface, and the method of applying the coating. Typically this can take an hour or more.
Avant d’appliquer un revêtement céramiqu: Before applying a ceramic coating, make sure the car surface is clean and decontaminated. In general, it is recommended to wait at least 24 hours after washing and decontamination before applying the coating.
La durée de vie d’un revêtement céramiqu: The lifespan of a ceramic coating depends on various factors, including product quality, weather conditions, regular maintenance, and how the car is used. Generally, high quality ceramic coatings can last at least more than 2 years.
Bien que les revêtements céramiques soie: Although ceramic coatings are durable, they are generally not permanent. They can last for several years, but exposure to the elements, frequent washing, and other environmental factors can eventually reduce their effectiveness. It is recommended to reapply the coating after a period of time to maintain optimal protection.

Les revêtements céramiques FUSIOCOAT® pr: FUSIOCOAT® ceramic coatings protect all exterior car surfaces against environmental attacks responsible for degradation, dulling and excessive soiling of paint, glass, metals and plastics. FUSIOCOAT® products meet the requirements of each of these surfaces by offering unrivaled durability, both in terms of preserving aesthetics and in terms of functionality and comfort of use.
Le Pionnier de la Protection Esthétique: The Pioneer of Aesthetic Protection of
FC – AÉRO est à ce jour le seul revêteme: FC – AÉRO is to date the only nanoceramic coating that enhances the aesthetics of painted and metal aeronautical surfaces, while protecting them sustainably against climatic effects and chemical contaminants.
Utilisé dans l’industrie aéronautique ci: Used in the civil aeronautics industry for the anti-corrosion protection of metal surfaces, FC – AÉRO is today the pioneering product for sports and leisure aeronautics, for which aesthetic and functional durability as well as ease of maintenance are essential.
FC – AÉRO apporte une brillance éclatant: FC – AÉRO provides dazzling shine and spectacular depth of color. Surfaces become permanently shiny and colors are preserved and amplified.
Une fois appliqué, FC – AÉRO forme des l: Once applied, FC – AÉRO forms strong chemical bonds with surfaces, allowing a minimum durability of 5 years against corrosion, climatic effects and non-hydraulic fluids, such as kerosene, oils and detergents.
La formulation unique de FC – AÉRO exalt: The unique formulation of FC – AÉRO enhances hydrophobicity. Water glides wonderfully on surfaces and the adhesion of insects and other environmental contaminants is greatly minimized, making regular maintenance easier.
Notre formule avancée permet une applica: Our advanced formula allows rapid application in a single pass by simply wiping to form a layer of several microns. The layer is dry to the touch only 45 minutes after application and fully stabilized after 24 hours.
Notre priorité est la sécurité des utili: Our priority is user safety and respect for the environment. Our formula is non-toxic and complies with European REACH regulations.

est à ce jour l’ultime revêtement protec: is to date the ultimate surface protective coating in the marine environment. De manière générale, un revêtement céram: Generally speaking, a ceramic coating is a second skin that is deposited on a surface, forming a protective barrier.
Le revêtement céramique comble la porosi: The ceramic coating fills the porosity of the surface and forms a uniform film which improves the resistance of a material against environmental attacks (chemical exposure, temperatures, UV irradiation, etc.) or mechanical stress linked to its handling.
Les propriétés esthétiques de la surface: The aesthetic properties of the surface are preserved, or even improved for certain surfaces. The ceramic coating repels water and UV rays and reduces the adhesion of dirt and pollutants, also making cleaning easier. In addition, depending on their “hardness” they can protect against scratches and minor impacts.
Cependant, les performances des revêtem: However, the performance of ceramic coatings will essentially depend on their adhesion to the materials to be protected and the chemical and physical resistance of the ingredients constituting them. As such, not all ceramics are equal and the vast majority of commercially available ceramic coatings are so-called sacrificial coatings, which have limited lifespans, typically from a few months to 2 years maximum.
Les revêtements céramiques proposés pour: The ceramic coatings offered for surface protection in the automotive sector are composed of silicon-based minerals alone or in combination with organic resins. They are applied by wiping or spraying to form layers with thicknesses generally between 100 nm and 2 microns.
La différence majeure entre les revêteme: The major difference between ceramic coatings available commercially today lies in their chemical compositions and which will define the ADHESION and HARDNESS of the coating on the substrate, as well as its CHEMICAL, MECHANICAL AND PHYSICAL RESISTANCE, therefore its DURABILITY.
